name: carcinisation (Chelsea Stearns)
description:
2.0 is a podcast where two brothers improve things that are fine. On their episode improving crabs, they declared that crabs should have to show us what makes them so great.

Control with WASD or your arrow keys, and pick up the sparkles.

Dialogue transcribed and partially paraphrased from the "crabs" episode of 2.0; give them a listen. I am not a crab scientist, and can not confirm any of the facts.  I just thought this was a very funny little conversation, and their discussion of secret crab olympic island made me want to make a bitsy.

Made with Bitsy by Adam Ledoux. Cover font is Segoe UI Heavy.
